message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to pay $11,000. This is my final offer.
